## TokensToWrap type

Input for wrapping any number of tokens

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TokensToWrap = {
    erc20Tokens?: ERC20Wrappable[];
    erc721Tokens?: ERC721Wrappable[];
    erc1155Tokens?: ERC1155Wrappable[];
};
```
